page.title: 04New Estate in Chelmsford (1)
page.content: We have interviewed many people on the{Newlands Spring estate}ranging from some of the children in our school to some of the elderly people to find out what facilities there are for them and some of the things that the estate does not provide that they would like to see. The{facilities}for people to enjoy themselves are{limited although there are some things for the children. There are play areas but many would like to see a small swimming pool.{The children generally {like the estate}because they have many friends close by to play with. Most of the{adults would like}the estate to have a proper{community centre}where people could come together for social occasions. We found from asking that a community centre would encourage the elderly people to come out into the community rather than staying at home.
